comment: Stallings is very sweet and will talk to you about anything. Just read the assigned text, do the discussion posts (or don't, I didn't and passed), and you will be fine. Not a tough grader at all. I agree she does need to diversify her viewpoints.
rating_tags: Get ready to read--LOTS OF HOMEWORK--Caring

comment: Amazing. So kind and caring and genuinely wants you to succeed. She really cares about her students.

Professor Stallings cares about her students and the material we learn in Freshman Seminar even though it can be unnecessary and repetitive. The class has lots of busy work but is easy. My only qualm would be that she seems to be a bit naïve about diverse viewpoints (being LGBT, being a POC, etc) which I feel is crucial in a class like this.
